name: Conmined
description:
Battle and explode your way through hordes of gruesome underground monsters and carve out your own path towards freedom! Conceptualized and created in 10 days for the annual Bullet Hell Jam 2022. The theme was CONFINED.

CONTROLS/HOW TO PLAY: 

  • Move: WASD
  • Fire Weapon: Left Click
  • Mine/Dig/Melee Attack: Right Click
  • Use Bomb: Space
  • Interact/Buy: E

Note: In the game jam version there currently is a rare bug in the main menu where the camera doesn't get loaded sometimes; the game should run find after reopening once!
